snippet: Many of the questions at Berkshire Hathaway’s annual investor meeting dwelled on what life after Warren E. Buffett will look like. But for the chief executive of NetJets, that’s one of the least of his concerns.
abstract: Many of the questions at Berkshire Hathaway’s annual investor meeting dwelled on what life after Warren E. Buffett will look like. But for the chief executive of NetJets, that’s one of the least of his concerns.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Succession at Berkshire Is Minor Concern for NetJets' Chief
